Articles.Content:
Hi there!

Here is my last creation: the **Kairbus K-20m**

**Data:**

- 91 parts
- 48,6 t
- 24m / 25,3m / 10,6m (L/W/H)
- Place for 20 Kerbal
- Abillity to harvest Ore

**Action Groups:**

1 - toggle Engines

2 - toggle flaps (for better takeoff and landing)

3 - toggle solar panels

4 - toggle cargobay doors

5 - toggle "drilling thing"

6 - start mining

7 - stop mining

8 - start converting into LiquidFuel

9 - stop converting into LiquidFuel

**Photos:**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/lIbnK)

**Craftfile**: [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/11698414/K-20m.craft](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/11698414/K-20m.craft)

Feel free to comment and critizice!

**All my thanks go to Squad and the team for this lovely game!**![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-07T11:19:57Z" title="05/07/2015 11:19  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 7, 2015</time> by CookieS**
  
forgotten information!

Except for the missing T-Fuselage, this craft could have also been named KAe 146 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) .

Nice one though, take a rep ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) .
